name: The 3rd Corner Wine Shop & Bistro
address: 73101 Hwy 111 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Interesting concept of picking your own wine bottle and then heading on to dinner. The menu had a good creative selection of items. However, when the food came, everything was just a little too salty for us. Not enough to send it back but salty enough that we failed to really taste the potential of the food because of it.

name: Acqua Pazza California Bistro
address: 71-800 Hwy 111 Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: We really enjoyed our dinner on Friday night. The food was good, service was OK, but it was a great dinner - easily accessible from our hotel. We would return and recommend Acqua Pazza to our friends.

name: Adobe Grill
address: Waldorf Astoria Laquinta Resort & Spa 49-499 Eisenhower Dr. La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: Service and the food is always great. Best Mexican food and setting in the Valley

name: Arnold Palmer's Restaurant
address: 78-164 Avenue 52 La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: Service was prompt, professional, and friendly. Food (Short Ribs) was excellent. Putting green outside was a fun post-dinner activity.

name: Augusta Restaurant - Palm Desert
address: 73951 El Paseo Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Meals not delivered as ordered. Waiter inattentive and did not return to table promptly after meals served by assistants. One meal returned to kitchen. That individual sat with no food while meal re-prepared as ordered. Everyone else eating their meal. Children running around playing loudly on back lawn. Celebrating birthday. No special welcome or courtesies extended. Unable to acommodate special dietary requests after Phillipe confirmed they were able to do so.

name: Backstreet Bistro
address: 72-820 El Paseo Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Delightful neighborhood find. Friendly service, accomodating for those with food allergies, outdoor seating for those with pets. Menu had many options. Would not recommend for young children.

name: The Beer Hunter - Menifee
address: 30080 Haun Road Suite 350 Menifee, CA  92586
review description: Had a great time with the wife, kids and family for Mothers Day. Everyone loves sports so this was the perfect place to have lunch, have a few beers, enjoy the afternoon games while spending time with the family.

name: Bellatrix
address: 75-200 Classic Club Blvd Palm Desert, CA  92211
review description: Our meal was not really very good. We had a beet salad that was not crunchy as it should have been. Our scallops were cooked well but on a bed of home fries with apple shreds. There was a honey sauce around the dish edge that was strange. Very bland. All in all, disappointing.

name: The Bistro - Fantasy Springs Resort & Casino
address: 84-245 Indio Springs Parkway Indio, CA  92203
review description: Best spicy spring rolls I've ever had and beautifully presented.

name: Blue Coyote Bar & Grill
address: 445 N. Palm Canyon Dr. Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: I liked this place a lot and will definitely go back! The margaritas are awesome and the food is really good. Fun place to be!

name: BluEmber at Rancho Las Palmas Resort & Spa
address: 41000 Bob Hope Dr Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: Too many kids running around, we took friend there for a relaxing evening.

name: Capri Restaurant at Miracle Springs Resort & Spa
address: 10625 Palm Drive Desert Hot Springs, CA  92240
review description: Terrific beef - love the food. Prices including drinks are very reasonable. Worth the drive to Desert Hot Springs.

name: Cava - Renaissance Esmeralda Resort & Spa
address: 44400 Indian Wells Lane Indian Wells, CA  92210
review description: The food was excellent, the service outstanding! The waitress was very friendly and very attentive, especially since there were children in our group. The experience was so wonderful, we returned the following morning for brunch. A+.

name: Chez Pierre
address: 44250 Town Center Way, Suite C1 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Always a lovely place to spend the evening. The service is excellent, the French bistro fare authentic and unpretentious. Pierre is a delightful chef and host.

name: Chop House Palm Desert
address: 74-040 Highway 111 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Great food, good service and very nice place to dine. Food was served very fast, and the service was attentive and friendly.

name: Chop House Palm Springs
address: 262 South Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: We've been to the Chop House many times, have loved it every time. I'm not sure if because the street fair was going on outside, or if because it was slow. Our service was not horrible, but hadn't been as good as we've received there every other time. It was BOTH of our birthdays, the day we were there & no recognition whatsoever, & yes it was stated in our reservation. But like always the food was phenomenal!

name: Cielo
address: 49500 Seminole Drive Cabazon, CA  92230
review description: Elegant ambiance 27 floors above the desert. Great views. Outstanding food. The macaroni lobster side dish was superb! A perfect spot for that very special occasion!

name: Circa59 at Riviera Palm Springs
address: 1600 N Indian Canyon Dr Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Its my 3rd time dining here, the food is excellent but the service is questionable. We always wait about 10 minutes before anyone even comes by, then this time the waiter came by and offered water, and was doing his pitch for bottled water, and we said just regular, and he snuffed his face and said "TAP", we were kind of shocked. Like I said food is always excellent but I would suggest you take some of the staff from the SIDEBAR and bring them over to get the great level of service you would expect at this restaurant. Definitely have the mussels, and the roquefort crusted filet.

name: Citron at the Viceroy Palm Springs
address: 415 S. Belardo Rd. Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Very nice setting for lunch or dinner. good food, good service.

name: Cliffhouse
address: 78-250 Highway 111 La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: We enjoyed another wonderful dinner at the cliff house. We were seated by the stone fireplace and enjoyed the view, atmosphere and ambience. Food and service were excellent as always. Enjoyed the special per-fixed dinner pricing. The restaurant is in the midst of renovations, but it didn't seem to affect quality of food or service.

name: Colony Palms Hotel
address: 572 N. Indian Canyon Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Good food, terrific location, but the arrogant waiter diva pulls it down. Why can't nice places like this hire better people.

name: Cork Tree Restaurant
address: 74950 Country Club Dr. Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Took my parents here for dinner. We all loved the ambiance (dark, wood, plush), food (beautifully presented) and service (prompt and courteous). We also thought the prices were a good value for what we received. I highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Cuistot
address: 72595 El Paseo Ave Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Mushroom soup continues to be awesome. Good food great service.

name: Daily Grill - Palm Desert
address: 73-061 El Paseo Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Appetizers were excellent. Bar tender not overly friendly, more into the TV. The steak for dinner was over cooked. The waitress Tilly was outstanding. The prices high for off season Desert.

name: Desert Sage
address: 78-085 Avenida La fonda La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: Sam, the GM, took the time for a personal touch to our Anniversary. Desert Sage was recommended by friends in the area and it did not disappoint.

name: Ernie's
address: Waldorf Astoria Laquinta Resort & Spa 56150 PGA Blvd La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: This is the Club House Restaurant for the PGA West Stadium Course. Outstanding view of the Nicklaus Course. Great staff. Learned on this weekend trip that Ernie's has a Bloody Mary Buffet Set up on the Weekend. All of the wide spectrum of ingredients are out for you to blend your own Bloody Mary. The food is alway fresh and innovative. I have never been disappointed dining here!

name: The Falls Prime Steakhouse - Palm Springs
address: 155 South Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Dining service and food was very good. Before dinner we went to sit in the beautiful outside bar and got an "attitude" from the main male bartender so we just went in to eat.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Rancho Mirage
address: 71800 Highway 111 Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: Absolutly loved this place !! Went for anniversary and had a great time !

name: Grove Artisan Kitchen at Miramonte Resort & Spa
address: 45000 Indian Wells Lane Indian Wells, CA  92210
review description: Awesome berry cobbler and vanilla ice cream from the dessert menu. Im not sure if they make their own ice cream, but we both greed that it was the beat vanilla ice cream we had ever had (we are big chocolate fans, but it swayed us). I had the scallops and panko crusted sea bass. Both were excellent. My husband had the strip steak and lobster bisque. The lobster bisque was delicious, but the steak was average. So overall, we were very impressed with everything that we had except the steak. The staff was prompt but not overbearing, service was excellent, and we were seated at our reservation time. We would definitely return if we are in the area again.

name: Guillermo's Restaurante
address: 72850 El Paseo Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: ALWAYS AMAZING! GREAT FOOD! GUILLERMO ALWAYS VISITS OUR TABLE HE IS LIKE FAMILY, WARM & INGRATIATING.CARLOS IS AN EXCELLENT WAITER, WHO ALWAYS GETS IT RIGHT, NO MATTER HOW LARGE OUR GROUP IS. DID I MENTION, HE CREATES A FUN AND LIVELY BANTER. OUR GUESTS LIKE HIM, AS MUCH AS WE DO.THANK YOU,LILO COOPER

name: Hog's Breath Inn
address: 78065 Main Street, Second Floor La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: Finally made it to your restaurant on our 3rd trip to Palm Springs and must saywe were really disappointed. Was the one place we were really looking forward to visiting. We were just sat (wasn't very busy) and not even offered to sit outside on the patio which is what we really wanted. Looked as if it was closed but towards the end of our meal we realised people were going out there.We had a special you had on to celebrate an occasion. Can't remember what it was but you got a starter and a main course. The soup and bread was very nice but the steak was not a proper steak. It was like a, how can I put it, meatball like texture of meat kind of stuck together. I was totally bored with it by the time i'd eaten half of it. My wife left hers.

name: IW Club
address: 44500 Indian Wells Lane Indian Wells, CA  92210
review description: consistently good! can't beat that!

name: Jackalope Ranch
address: 80400 Highway 111 Indio, CA  92201
review description: Probably one of the most beautiful settings in the desert! Simply beautifu. Ambiance was excellent for a romantic dinner or group setting. Ribs were good. Filet Mignon was good. I never had a bacon wrapped date before. Excellent appetizer! Server was on the ball!!! Very attentive to our needs.

name: Jake's - Palm Springs
address: 664 North Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Great food, great service. What else can I say? Jake's is a must-do when visiting Palm Springs! Just keep in mind, they do close for the summer, so make sure they're open before you go.

name: Johannes
address: 196 South Indian Canyon Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: our waitress was very good and energetic however she constantly interrupted our conversation rather than approach the table and wait for us to end the sentence we were on. She was more mature so I expected that she would have know the proper way to approach a table. Otherwise the evening was very nice and we did not let her bother us although by about the fourth time my guest was getting irritated.

name: JOY Asian Cuisine - Fantasy Springs Casino & Resort
address: 84-245 Indio Springs Parkway Indio, CA  92203
review description: I have dined here many times and each time prior the service was exceptional. This time the service seemed to be not quite up to par. I hope it was just a glitch and things will continue to be as remarkable as before.

name: Kaiser Grille
address: 205 South Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Great food and excellent service!

name: King's Highway
address: 701 East Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: Whenever we head to Palm Springs, whether we are staying at the adjoining Ace Hotel or not, we always stop at the Kings Highway diner/restaurant. The food is very good and a little more elevated than your typical joint - a grilled cheese isn't just one cheese, but three-four "stinky" cheeses with a side of pickled veggies. The chilled tomato soup was also amazing - and a huge amount! It's not a cup size, but a full meal.

name: Kobe Japanese Steak House
address: 69-838 Highway 111 Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: We have been to other Kobe Steakhouses which were much more friendly feeling. The chef was good but the wait staff was just mediocre . We would not say we had a great dining experience.

name: La Brasserie Bistro and Bar
address: 78-477 Hwy 111 La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: We have always had outstanding food at this wonderful restaurant. The wait staff is just as outstanding.

name: Lavender Bistro
address: 78073 Calle Barcelona La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: First time guest and was very impressed! Excellent food and service and was pleasantly surprised by the entertainment, which was wonderful. We can't wait until they reopen in September! Thank you for a very enjoyable evening.

name: Le Donne Cucina Italiana
address: 72-624 El Paseo Ste C7 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Definitely lived up to its reputation to have the best linguine and clams in the desert. Best salmon and spinach I've ever had. The only things they need to work on are the bread and the salad. They were not the greatest. Great service and nice quiet atmosphere.

name: Le Vallauris
address: 385 West Tahquitz Canyon Way Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Great atmosphere and lovely outdoor space. The scallops wrapped in filo dough were unique and perfectly cooked. The duck was seared perfectly crisp with a cherry reduction that was amazing. The lamb, unfortunately was under seasoned and bland.

name: Leon's at Desert Princess
address: 28555 Landau Boulevard Cathedral City, CA  92234
review description: One of our favorite restaurants in the desert! The food is always served at the correct temperature and is always perfectly prepared. The Dover sole is unbelievably delicious. Ask for Steve to serve you. He is funny, knows the menu backwards and forwards and you are sure to have a wonderful and memorable meal.

name: LG's Prime Steakhouse - La Quinta
address: 78525 Highway 111, Ste 100 La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: I've been eating at LG's restaurants for nearly 20-years. Despite eating at all the major steakhouses in the Coachella Valley, LG's remains my favorite.

name: LG's Prime Steakhouse - Palm Springs
address: 255 S. Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: The food was great but the service was disappointing. We did not feel welcomed at all.

name: Lulu California Bistro
address: 200 S. Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Although the service was good, the waiter was excellent; however, servers are just that, servers, don't expect anything except the food being placed on the table. I guess they are to busy to respond to requests or thank-you.

name: Lyons English Grille
address: 233  E  Palm Canyon Dr Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Food was wonderful and our waiter, Vic, was just as colorful as the restaurant itself. This is just a fun place to have dinner. But leave yourself a lot of time. They don't like to rush you and you can have a very nice relaxed dinner. Great spot and I will continue to go back often.

name: Manhattan in the Desert
address: 2665 East Palm Canyon Road Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: You can't go wrong at Manhattan in the Desert. Great deli foods served in heaping portions. Best deal soup and half-sandwich. We have been eating at this deli since they opened and the food and service consistently exceeds our expectations. We also have our favorite waiter - Luis. He is attentive and friendly as are the other staff.

name: Maracas
address: 155 S. Palm Canyon Dr. #B1 Palm Springs, CA  92562
review description: Sitting outdoors on a balmy April night and watching the world go by in downtown Palm Springs was a pleasant experience. The margaritas were good, the food was fine, but hardly revolutionary. My server was pleasant and attentive without hovering, always a good thing when you just want to drink your drinks and people-watch.

name: Matchbox Palm Springs
address: 155 South Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Nothing better then a little sushi to start in their tempura shrimp roll, followed by a great pizza and a fresh beet salad. Healthy kind of, and a great view of the strip.

name: Melvyn's Restaurant
address: 200 W Ramon Rd Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: This was our first time eating here. It was great! EVERYTHING about it was great. We will for sure go back again very soon.

name: Mikado at Desert Springs JW Marriott
address: 74855 Country Club Drive Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: The alcoholic drinks were over priced and small size for the quality.

name: Miro's Restaurant
address: 1555 S. Palm Canyon Dr. Ste H-101 Palm Springs, CA  92260
review description: Always an outstanding experience. The overall best restaurant in Palm Springs.

name: mister parker's - Parker Palm Springs
address: Parker Palm Springs, 4200 East Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: Great staff -- Steven and Ryan made sure we had everything. Menu: standard hotel --- with a hip clientele, why not branch out?

name: Morgan's in the Desert
address: Waldorf Astoria Laquinta Resort & Spa 49-499 Eisenhower Drive La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: Wonderful musician, Paul Douglas, at the piano bar!

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Palm Desert
address: 74-880 Country Club Drive Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Service was excellent. Sometimes almost to a fault

name: The Nest
address: 75-188 Hwy 111 Indian Wells, CA  92210
review description: My husband and I went looking for an 0ld school vibe and got it in spades. If you enjoy piano bars with a disco ball, attentive and friendly service, great cocktails and are looking for a bit of the desert from the 60s you will love.

name: Nicolino's Italian Restaurant
address: 35325 Date Palm Drive, Ste 111 Cathedral City, CA  92234
review description: Good food. Nice neighborhood find

name: Norma's - Parker Palm Springs
address: 4200 East Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: This was not our first visit to the Parker Palm Springs. We knew what to expect--great food and service in a "happy chic" resort. We wandered the beautiful gardens and visited the one-of-a-kind lobby bar before dinner. I love that each past occasion the experience has been unique and exquisit.

name: Okura Robata Grill and Sushi Bar - La Quinta
address: 78370 Highway 111, Ste 150 La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: This is exactly what we wanted. Sushi and it was yummy. Enjoyed eating here very much.

name: Pacifica Seafood Restaurant
address: 73505 El Paseo, Suite F-2608 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: I felt that the food was very overpriced.

name: Peaks Restaurant
address: One Tramway Road Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Hawaiian store bought rolls. Horrible tartar. Lamb over cooked. Not worth the price. Tables sticky. Took three attempts to get a dinner menu instead of lunch.

name: Piero's Pizzavino
address: 73-722 El Paseo Drive, #1 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: The best pizza this side of italy

name: Pizzeria Villagio
address: 37029 Cook St., Suite 101 Palm Desert, CA  92211
review description: Traditional Italian food with creative presentations and consistently good. Waitstaff always upbeat and ready to make suggestions.

name: POM - Fantasy Springs Resort & Casino
address: 84-245 Indio Springs Parkway Indio, CA  92203
review description: I've given many, many reviews to POM because they are always a great restaurant and consistently provide great food. I never hesitate to take anyone to POM because I just know that it will always be a good time.

name: Rockwood Grill and Blue Star Lounge
address: 74855 Country Club Drive Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: I would definitely recommend Rockwood Grill. Has a variety of food options to please anyone that dines in. Whether you are looking for seafood, burgers, or even a salad, you will be well-fed with amazing food. For an appetizer, I would suggest the Spinach and Artichoke dip with Crab. AMAZING!!!

name: Roscoe Grill
address: 665 South Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: First off, the Mojito was particularly good. The wild greens salad quite good, the swordfish dinner excellent (the rather rich sauce, usually a dangerous thing to try with fish, was surprisingly good - very distinctive), and the coconut cake also excellent. I'm one who's come to be prepared and even expect disappointments dining in Palm Springs, and can be quick to give negative feedback, but this meal was first-rate - and all 3 courses bundled together cost only $22.

name: Roy's Rancho Mirage
address: 71959 Highway 111 Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: outstanding food and service. Great Job Crew works as a team.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Palm Desert
address: 74740 Highway 111 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Ruth's Chris has always been our favorite steak house (we have dined in many, from New Orleans to San Francisco). The steaks are always the best, and the service is usually impeccable. This is definitely the best steak house in the Coachella Valley!

name: Sammy G's Tuscan Grill
address: 265 S. Palm Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Heather was the best waitress, she examples the menu & told us jokes

name: Sirocco - Renaissance Resort & Spa
address: 44400 Indian Wells Lane Indian Wells, CA  92210
review description: This is a very good restaurant. It was our first visit to this restaurant, but we will return again. The menu has a good selection of Italian meals and the waiter said if you have a favorite Italian dish that is not on the menu, our chef will do his best to make it for you.The service was 10/10. Our waiter Elliott was a seasoned veteran and provided the best service we have experienced in the Coachella Valley. Valet parking at the front of the hotel was very efficient. The restaurant manager came by during the meal to make sure everything was good and thank us for joining them. He was also waiting at the door as we left to serve us complimentaru giftwrapped Biscotti's to go.There is alo a great lounge in the foyer of the hotel.

name: Solano's Bistro in Old Town La Quinta
address: 78075 Main Street Suite 105-106 La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: This restaurant was surprisingly good. We all had seafood which was cooked to perfection. The scallops and shrimp with beurre blanc were outstanding.

name: Spencer's Restaurant
address: 701 W. Baristo Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: We always enjoy Spencer's, especially the outdoor lanai dining area.

name: The Steakhouse at Agua Caliente
address: 32250 Bob Hope Dr Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: Went for date night w/ hubby! :) Very good service and good food. Romantic dinner setting, upscale and quiet...Not for kids/families.Have had better seasoned steaks and courses but this is great given the competition in the area. It is local and intimate; will definitely return

name: Steakhouse at the Spa
address: 401 East Amado Road Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: The noise from the casino is very annoying. Poor planning in design. This is a very expensive steak house and the ambience is destroyed by the constant noise of slot machines. Overall the food was very good but certainly not worthy of the very steep price. This is my 3rd visit and will be my last.

name: Sullivan's Steakhouse - Palm Desert
address: 73505 El Paseo Suite 2600 Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: Sullivans is always excellent. Great place to go. The service and food are terrific.Ask for Ericka to serve you. She is wonderful!

name: Three Sixty North, Lounge + Restaurant
address: 360 North Palm Canyon Dr. Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Our waitress was the most inattentive waitress I have ever seen. One waitress for the whole place and she still stood around. Our drink bill would have been doubled if was a good waitress. Two of us ordered a special martini off the dinner menu and no one knew how to make it. The manager sat in the corner and smoked cigarettes and did not have a concern in the world.

name: Tinto - The Saguaro - Palm Springs
address: 1800 East Palm Canyon Palm Springs, CA  92264
review description: In my opinion the best place in the desert. The food is wildly creative and different. The wine list is unique and expansive. Most food served as tapas so a great way to sample many new dishes. My only criticism is that the concrete floor and high ceilings make for a very loud environment.

name: Tommy Bahama's Restaurant & Bar - Palm Desert
address: 73-595 El Paseo Palm Desert, CA  92260
review description: I didn't give it a 5 Star rating because I think their prices are way too high but the food was excellent.However, if you wanted a vegetable with your dinner you had to pay extra! I had the crab stuffed shrimp & my husband had the 20oz rib-eye steak. Mine was excellent. His was under cooked even after the waiter came back saying reason for the wait for our food was because they had to put his steak in the oven since it was so thick.(He asked for well done!).But it was still pink inside but he said it was edible the way it was. The bread before the meal was a little too hard for my liking.Beautiful view even from inside since the restaurant is upstairs. This was our 1st time so finding it was a little tricky. Had to ask inside the store!

name: Trilussa Ristorante
address: 68-718 East Palm Canyon Drive, #401 Cathedral City, CA  92234
review description: Great food and service! Ordered off the Local's Prix Fix menu which had a ton of food for really cheap. The appetizer salad was really a whole salad. I left feeling nice and full. Whenever I return to Palm Springs, I would definitely go back to this place since the food was excellent. Everyone needs a good Italian Restaurant destination where ever they travel to.

name: Trio Restaurant - Palm Springs
address: 707 North Palm Canyon Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Trio is a very happening place and seems to appeal to locals and tourists alike. We had a great meal and experienced wonderful service. Love this place! No complaints, would come back again and again.

name: The Tropicale
address: 330 East Amado Road Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Palm Springs is lucky to have this gem of a restaurant in it's mix. Good fun, good service, lovely ambiance - Tropicale has it all.

name: TWENTY6
address: Waldorf AstoriaLaquinta Resort & Spa 49499 Eisenhower Drive La Quinta, CA  92253
review description: We had a very good dinner. The food was excellent. The service was excellent. The fish and chips was better than what we had at a restaurant specializing seafood. The french dip roast beef sandwich was also excellent. The chef gave us an flatbread appetizer that was so good that we would probably have ordered it if we had known. The lollipop ice-cream that they gave us complimentary was great. Definitely would go back if we are in the area again.

name: Wally's Desert Turtle
address: 71775 Highway 111 Rancho Mirage, CA  92270
review description: The Best in the Desert for a special meal. Excellent food, impeccable service always.

name: Wang's in the Desert
address: 424 South Indian Canyon Drive Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Best Chinese food in Palm Springs, but unfortunately that isn't saying much.

name: Zin American Bistro
address: 198 S Palm Canyon Dr Palm Springs, CA  92262
review description: Great calamari, and shrimp with risotto was cooked perfectly. Delicious, we will be back, also a great server, very attentive, whitty, and gave us great recommendations.
